training_plan.title: Full Stack Developer Intern Internship Training Plan
training_plan.description: A comprehensive training plan for a 210-hour internship in Software Development, designed to equip interns with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel as a Full Stack Developer Intern.

tasks.title: Task 1: Introduction to Frontend Development
tasks.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

techStacks.name: HTML
techStacks.description: Hypertext Markup Language for structuring content on the web.

techStacks.name: CSS
techStacks.description: Cascading Style Sheets for styling web pages.

techStacks.name: JavaScript
techStacks.description: Programming language for adding interactivity to web pages.

skills.name: Web Development Basics
skills.description: Understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals.

tasks.title: Task 2: Introduction to Backend Development
tasks.description: Learn the basics of Node.js and Express framework.

techStacks.name: Node.js
techStacks.description: JavaScript runtime environment for server-side programming.

techStacks.name: Express
techStacks.description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js.

skills.name: Server-Side Programming
skills.description: Understanding of Node.js and Express framework basics.

tasks.title: Task 3: Frontend Development
tasks.description: Develop a user interface for a web application using React.

techStacks.name: React
techStacks.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

skills.name: Frontend Development
skills.description: The practice of converting data to a graphical interface, via the user, especially in web development.

tasks.title: Task 4: Backend Development
tasks.description: Create a REST API using Node.js and Express.

techStacks.name: Node.js
techStacks.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

techStacks.name: Express
techStacks.description: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework.

skills.name: Backend Development
skills.description: The server-side of the application, responsible for managing data, requests, and interactions.

tasks.title: Task 5: Full Stack Development
tasks.description: Develop a full stack application with a RESTful API and a user-friendly frontend.

techStacks.name: Node.js
techStacks.description: A JavaScript runtime environment for executing JavaScript code server-side.

techStacks.name: React
techStacks.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: A programming language used for both front-end and back-end development.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.description: Ability to solve complex problems in software development.
